=================
### Fuel Tank System Repairs and Replacement
#### Call for Tenders

**Reference Number**: PW_HAL_414_11565
**Amendment Number**: 1

**Solicitation Number**: W684H_220088/A
**Publication Date**: August 24, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: September 20, 2022 at 1:00 PM EST

**Background and Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, has issued a call for tenders to provide a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the repair and replacement of various fuel tank system installations at Canadian Forces Base Halifax (CFB Halifax). The work includes repairs, replacements, removals, and permanent withdrawals of underground and above-ground fuel storage tank system installations.

**Contract Requirements and Conditions**

* The offeror must provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision to complete the work.
* The work must conform to the requirements outlined in Annex A of the Statement of Work (WS-21221936) dated December 8, 2021.
* The contract would have an initial term from November 1, 2022, to October 31, 2023, with options for two additional one-year extensions.
* The tender is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Tender Evaluation and Award Criteria**

* The award of the contract will be made based on the lowest price.
* Documents submitted must be in either English or French. Electronic transmission of tender documents is optional and can be completed through the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation.
